User Story: As a Parent I want to register and login securely with password hashing and CSRF protection so that my account is protected
Comments: Implemented Werkzeug scrypt hashing and CSRF tokens on all forms. Secure session management added. - Chichebendu

User Story: As an Admin I want Role-Based Access Control so that only authorized users can access specific system functions
Comments: RBAC complete with @admin_required and @tutor_required decorators. All routes protected. - Chichebendu. Security layer looks solid! - Sanchit

User Story: As an Admin I want to manage activities and users so that I can organize school programs and oversee system access
Comments: Activity CRUD and user management dashboard implemented. Admins can reset passwords and assign roles. - Chichebendu

User Story: As a Parent I want to add my children to my profile with age and grade information so that I can book activities for them
Comments: Child management module complete with age validation. Seamlessly integrated with booking system. - Sharjeel. Works perfectly with my booking logic! - Shiva

User Story: As a Tutor I want to mark attendance for my assigned activities so that I can track student participation
Comments: Attendance tracking system implemented. Tutors can only access their own activities with proper authorization. - Sharjeel

User Story: As a Parent I want to view my child's attendance history so that I can monitor their participation in school programs
Comments: Attendance history visible on parent dashboard with export to CSV feature. - Sharjeel. CSV export is super useful! - Sanchit

User Story: As a Parent I want to book activities with automatic conflict and capacity validation so that my child can participate
Comments: Core booking engine with conflict detection and real-time capacity checking implemented. Prevents double-bookings. - Shiva

User Story: As a User I want waitlist functionality when activities are full so that I can secure a spot if someone cancels
Comments: Waitlist FIFO queue complete. Auto-promotion on cancellation with email notification trigger. - Shiva. Email integration works great! - Sanchit

User Story: As a Parent I want to cancel bookings and see real-time capacity updates for flexible schedule management
Comments: Cancellation logic with auto capacity increment. Real-time capacity display (X/10 slots) on activity cards. - Shiva

User Story: As a User I want to receive automated email confirmations for bookings so that I have a record of registration
Comments: Flask-Mail configured with booking confirmation emails. Includes activity details and confirmation number. - Sanchit

User Story: As a User I want professional PDF invoices with QR codes so that I can keep records and submit for reimbursement
Comments: ReportLab PDF generator with school logo and QR codes containing booking IDs. Professional invoice layout. - Sanchit. QR code idea is brilliant! - Sharjeel

User Story: As a Parent I want automated waitlist promotion emails so that I'm notified when a spot becomes available
Comments: Waitlist email automation complete with 24-hour acceptance deadline. Integrated with Shiva's waitlist module. - Sanchit. Perfect integration! - Shiva
